title: the crafting system??
body: i couldnt find a board where this really fit so ill just ask it here. i own every champion and i know i am not the only one.. when i hextech craft why am i still getting champion shards? this is why i refuse to buy them. waste of my money. grumbling completed

replies.body:
Remember this:

1) champion shards are not the same value as having a champion
2) you can use champion shards to gain additional mastery levels for champions, both by consuming fragments of the needed champion or by disenchanting them for blue essence ( you need 500 for every champion).
3) if you have already all champions you can use champion shards to get new champions when these come out for free; just reroll 3 champion shards and you are assured to get it - if you spent a lot of time and money i guess you deserve it ;)

for example, when ivern comes out instead of spending IP or RP you reroll 3 champion shards and if it is the only one you need to unlock you get it.
i jsut want to point out ive been playing league for nearly 6 years and have spent countless dollars on this game over the years.. but i have yet to buy into crafting.

Hextech loot is random, with the *only modifier* being that it *prioritizes* content that you don't already own. I own almost all the champions too, and I'll occasionally still get champion shards for champs I already own. 

For complete details about the system, check out our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
